title: 國際事務處意象宣傳影片大合集 NDHU OIA Concept Videos

標題： 國際事務處意象宣傳影片大合集 NDHU OIA Concept Videos
日期： Wed, 27 Dec 2023 17:42:37 +0800

大家好，

協助提供國際事務處近年籌製的意象宣傳影片連結供大家參考，敬請愛用。謝謝。

祝 期末平安 & 新年快樂

Dear all,

We are pleased to provide links to concept videos created by the Office of International Affairs (OIA), NDHU, in recent years for your reference. 

Feel free to share them with your family members and potential or future students. Thank you very much.

Wishing you a safe end to the semester and a happy New Year.
